title: sliders
content:
i'm surprised there isn't a thread on this. i just started watching, and i really like most of the episodes. the pilot, in particular, is one of the best psuedo-movies i've yet seen - and it ends on simply the most fearful (not scary or frightening, just fearful) chord.

Subconsciously, i probably started because of remembering a few i've watched as a child, in particular "The Dream Masters" and the infamous episode "Double Cross". Anyone else got any story?

The pilot, along with a few others, can be found here: http://www.surfthechannel.com/show/Sliders.html[quote]Quote:[hr]Just remember that this is the year of the elite devil.

1337 + 666 = 2003[hr][/quote]

"God is love." 1 john 4:8
"Love is not jealous." 1 corinthians 13:4
"I, the Lord thy God, am a jealous god." exodus 20:5

title: Re: sliders
content:
Sliders was a great series at first, but after a few seasons the plot started to drag on to nowhere in particular. I never saw the first episode, and I heard it was rather excellent. I'll head right over and download it.

Thinking back, Sliders stirs up some very strange memories.

Edit: Bleh... or maybe I'll download it via BitTorrent. Not gonna watch it YouTube style.

title: Re: sliders
content:
For me, sliders was pretty cool until, as Spleen said, it got out of its first season. It's just... a weird show. And it got VERY episodic and crappy. (Like Voyager.)

Besides I didn't like the main character. He was a dork.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: sliders
content:
I don't know.. the first season, of course, was the best, but the other episodes mostly weren't so bad, there were quite a few good ones, and were a few exceptionally good ones as well (Gillian of the Spirits, The Guardian... imo: World Killer, Murder Most Foul, The Prince of Slides for the humor)."God is love." 1 john 4:8
"Love is not jealous." 1 corinthians 13:4

title: Re: sliders
content:
There seems to be a definite feeling of quality loss over time here, and I must agree with it, the first series was gold, after that we got a lot of bronze and silver.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!
